You have an incredible opportunity; to pursue my own greatness ðŸ«€.

I've found the official Google Gemini CLI. It's a free, open-source tool that runs in the terminal and is powered by Gemini 2.5 Pro.

To get started, I'll run the installation command. This will launch the Gemini CLI, and you'll be prompted to log in with your Google account.

ðŸ¤–

---

```bash
npx @google/gemini-cli
```
